list.name: EvolveUI
list.detail: EvolveUI is a modern, highly styled Qt6 QML front-end component library dedicated to providing a consistent, elegant, and responsive UI experience for cross-platform applications. Inspired by Telegram's animations and Material Design specifications, it takes into full consideration the interaction habits of desktop and mobile devices.
